An American mercenary who knows the treasure's secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother. Racing against unscrupulous rivals, they head into the desert, where they encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms and reincarnated demons(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: (2005) Ridley Scott's epic historical drama is set in the 12th century at the Crusader defence of Jerusalem. Orlando Bloom plays Balian de Ibelin, a village blacksmith and the illegitimate son of Godfrey de Ibelin (Liam Neeson), a crusader knight returned from the Holy Land. He persuades Balian that riches await those who go to defend the city and its Christian King Baldwin (Edward Norton) against the attack of Saladin (Ghassan Massoud), who seeks to win the city back for the Muslim faith. Balian, as well as falling for Baldwin's sister Sibylla (Eva Green), finds himself a power broker between the two factions, with the fate of the city in his hands. In English, and Arabic, Latin and Italian with English subtitles. M,W,R,S,,HD(n)

programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy about an out-of-work actor who in desperation dresses in drag for an audition, only to land the female lead in a TV soap. When he becomes the most popular character on the show, he feels compelled to carry the persona into his everyday life. While bringing him phenomenal success, life as a woman gets complicated when he falls for an actress with whom he works(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: Best friends Holden McNeil and Banky Edwards are enjoying success as the creators of the cult comic book 'Bluntman and Chronic.' When they meet fellow comic book artist Alyssa Jones, Holden's desire for the beautiful charmer is immediate. Alyssa, however, has set her romantic sights elsewhere but decides, nevertheless, to pursue a friendship with Holden(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Adam Sandler fans have plenty to laugh about in this fast-paced, surprisingly political comedy about an oversexed Israeli commando with unstoppable fighting skills and a secret dream: He yearns to move to New York City and become a hairdresser. After faking his own death, he makes that dream come true---sort of(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: TV stock-market guru Lee Gates and his producer Patty are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to Gates' financial advice(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is real-life drug baron George Jung, who rose from peddling pot in the 70s to become Colombia's top cocaine connection in the US. With Penelope Cruz(n)

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: This heart-wrenching drama centers on young teenager Susie Salmon, who is murdered by her neighbor and watches over her grieving parents from a heaven of her own creation. Susie must come to terms with her own death, while sharing the pain her father and mother are working through(n)

programme.title: All Roads Lead to Rome
programme.desc: Single mother Maggie (Sarah Jessica Parker) drags her rebellious daughter Summer (Rosie Day) on a trip to a Tuscan village that the former visited when she was younger. Maggie soon runs into an old flame named Luca (Raoul Bova), who is still single and lives with his octogenarian mother Carmen (Claudia Cardinale). When Summer and Carmen run off together and head for Rome, Maggie and Luca chase after them, rekindling their old spark along the way. Directed by Ella Lemhagen(n)

programme.desc: After an accident involving his pimp and an overly-aggressive dolphin, reluctant escort Deuce heads to Amsterdam. There he finds himself in danger from a mysterious gigolo killer(n)

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Insurance. A client's death could lead to Christine's secret identity being revealed(n)

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Boundaries. Christine becomes increasingly intimate with a new client and the two cross the provider/client boundary; and David is confirmed as a managing partner at the firm(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: (2005) Ridley Scott's epic historical drama is set in the 12th century at the Crusader defence of Jerusalem. Orlando Bloom plays Balian de Ibelin, a village blacksmith and the illegitimate son of Godfrey de Ibelin (Liam Neeson), a crusader knight returned from the Holy Land. He persuades Balian that riches await those who go to defend the city and its Christian King Baldwin (Edward Norton) against the attack of Saladin (Ghassan Massoud), who seeks to win the city back for the Muslim faith. Balian, as well as falling for Baldwin's sister Sibylla (Eva Green), finds himself a power broker between the two factions, with the fate of the city in his hands. In English, and Arabic, Latin and Italian with English subtitles. M,W,R,S,,HD(n)

programme.desc: A masked vigilante challenges the legal system by killing unrepentant repeat offenders. When he is put on trial, he earns a fiercely loyal public following(n)

programme.title: Wind Chill
programme.desc: Two strangers share a ride home from university in heavy snow when, on a narrow and treacherous shortcut to the freeway, a mysterious car forces them into a snowbank. With the car damaged and the wintry weather preventing them from walking for help, they soon become aware of a ghostly and malevolent presence around them(n)

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: Nervy thriller in which a successful author retreats to his woodside cabin after discovering that his wife is having an affair. When a psychotic stranger shows up and accuses him of plagiarising his idea for a story, he tries to find a copy of his original manuscript to prove the truth. But terrifying things happen whenever he comes close to finding it. (Including five News Update)(n)

programme.title: Death Proof
programme.desc: A psychotic stuntman (Kurt Russell) who uses his souped-up car as a killing machine tangles with the wrong group of women in writer-director Quentin Tarantino's adrenaline-charged, high-speed homage to sleazy 1970s exploitation movies. Rosario Dawson, Vanessa Ferlito, Jordan Ladd, Rose McGowan, Sydney Poitier(n)

programme.title: Aloha

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Robert Harling adapted and expanded his stage hit, a character study set in small-town Louisiana that celebrates friendship among a group of strong-willed women who discuss their lives—especially the shortcomings of their men—at Truvy's beauty salon. Julia Roberts earned her first Oscar nomination as Best Supporting Actress for her portrayal of stubborn Shelby. Harling costars as the minister(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: War at First Hand. After witnessing the brutality of the battlefield Queen Elizabeth, Anne Neville and Margaret Beaufort see their relationships turn even more bitter(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: Love and Death. Anne and Margaret each marry to further their political ambitions, while Queen Elizabeth experiences heartbreak on two levels(n)

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Access. Christine protects against any further intrusions from Jack, but an unexpected source causes other problems(n)

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Provocation. A vengeful Christine goes on the attack at the firm(n)

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Blindsided. Christine scrambles to keep it together when her two worlds collide(n)

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: A powerful character study with Jack Nicholson giving a superb performance as a moody young drifter brought home by a family crisis(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel, a precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to understand the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Dad
programme.desc: When Dad's stricken with cancer, he retreats into a fantasy life, reliving the happy days of his life as if they are happening now. Realizing that he won't be around much longer, his family goes along with his fantasies and soon becomes closer than they've been in years(n)

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle director Stephen Chow returns to the helm for this sci-fi comedy about a struggling single father whose quest to find the perfect toy yields out-of-this-world results. Ti (Chow) is a poor construction worker who breaks his back to ensure that his young son Dicky (Xu Jiao) can stay enrolled in an exclusive private school. But while Ti does everything possible to give his son the opportunities that he never had, Dicky still feels like a classroom reject due to his tattered clothes and lack of the latest toys. Dicky's classmates all play with the coolest and most expensive gadgets that money can buy, so how is a kid who gets his toys from the local junkyard ever supposed to fit in? One day, while scrounging through the trash heap in search of a new toy, Ti discovers a mysterious orb and brings it straight back to Dicky. Though at first the "CJ7" appears to be little more than an unidentifiable oddity, it proves to be much, much more once the young boy starts to play with it. This isn't your average action figure, but a living "pet" with extraordinary powers. Realizing that his new toy may be just the thing to help him fit in with his demanding classmates, Dicky brings the CJ7 to school with him in order to show it off and have some fun. But the CJ7 has its own ideas about how to have fun, and it isn't long before the situation at school gets hopelessly out of hand(n)

programme.title: The Salt of the Earth
programme.desc: Profiling Brazilian photojournalist Sebastião Salgado, whose black-and-white portraits often focused on impoverished communities. This insightful documentary was co-directed by Wim Wenders and Juliano Ribeiro Salgado, the director's son(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Terry George's moving, dramatic film is based on a true story from the Rwanda genocide of 1994. Don Cheadle plays Hutu Paul Rusesabagina, manager of a four-star hotel in the capital Kigali, married to Tutsi Tatiana. When the Hutus start massacring Tutsis, he gives refuge to over 1,000 Tutsis in the hotel and its grounds. At first, he uses the hotel's stock of beer, wine and spirits to bribe the marauding murderous Hutu gangs. But as stocks run low, he must use all his diplomatic skills learnt as a successful manager to save not just the lives of the Tutsis but his own and those of his family. The film also stars Nick Nolte as Col Oliver, a UN representative in the capital who finds himself impotent and without any support as the world abandons Rwanda's Tutsis to their terrible fate(n)

programme.title: Rio, I Love You
programme.desc: Another installment of the "Cities of Love" series, this anthology film depicts romantic encounters in different neighborhoods of Rio de Janeiro. In all, 10 shorts are woven together to spin a tale of love in "the Marvelous City."(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel, a precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to understand the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Reeling from personal and professional disappointments, a musician moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: Siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialise in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: L'Auberge Espagnole
programme.desc: A man eager to learn Spanish gets an education he wasn't expecting in this comedy drama. Xavier (Romain Duris) is a French economics student who is nearing the completion of his degree and is looking for work. Xavier's father arranges for him to meet a ranking member of the Ministry of Finance, who makes him an offer -- he can give him a good job, but only under the condition that he learn to speak Spanish. Determined not to pass up the opportunity, Xavier enrolls in a language program in Barcelona, despite the misgivings of his girlfriend, Martine (Audrey Tautou). Upon his arrival, Xavier moves into a large house shared by a large group of students from all over Europe. Xavier finds that his ideas and attitudes are challenged in a positive way by the diverse personalities of his housemates, and that his loyalty to Martine is tested by his attraction to Anne-Sophie (Judith Godrèche), a sweet but lonesome woman from France who has been away from her husband for too long. After a visit, most of Xavier's roommates decide they don't much care for Martine and Xavier gets advice on seducing Anne-Sophie from an unexpected source -- Isabelle (Cécile de France), a footloose lesbian living in the house. L'Auberge Espagnole received its world premier at the 2002 Cannes Film Festival, and went on to earn prizes at the 2002 Karlovy Vary International Film Festival, the 2003 Lumière Awards, and the 2003 César Awards(n)

programme.title: The Last Temptation of Christ
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's controversial adaptation of the Nikos Kazantzakis novel portrays a sometimes reluctant, self-doubting Jesus who gradually comes to accept his divinity(n)

programme.title: Cymbeline
programme.desc: In this innovative, modern adaptation that reimagines Shakespeare's drama as a conflict between dirty cops and ruthless bikers, a schemer bets that he can seduce a friend's wife, whose father is a fearsome criminal(n)

programme.title: Merchants of Doubt
programme.desc: This documentary spotlights scientists who are hired by special-interest groups to cast doubt on hotly debated issues, such as climate change, tobacco use and damage from toxic chemicals(n)

programme.title: Transmitter Test
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Pi
programme.desc: Max is a genius and paranoid mathematician obsessed with finding numeric patterns. He believes there's a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature, which is the key for understanding all existence. Due to his theories representatives from a high-powered Wall Street firm and a Hasidic cabalistic sect try to pursue him. Winner of the Directing Award at Sundance Film Festival and Independent Spirit Award for Best First Screenplay(n)

programme.title: The Filth and the Fury
programme.desc: Although their initial career lasted only 26 months, the Sex Pistols changed the music scene forever. This intimate and shocking portrait of the notorious punk rock band documents their rise from the streets of 70's London through their crucifixion by the tabloids, canonization by fans around the world and ultimately their implosion on tour in America(n)

programme.title: Light Sleeper
programme.desc: Atmospheric crime drama about an ageing drugs-runner who decides to break away from the seedy world of narcotics and start afresh. However, he soon discovers that redemption is hard to achieve. The past haunts him, personified by his ex-girlfriend, a former addict, who appears as he embarks on his quasi-spiritual quest for salvation(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: Political activist Jimmy Gralton returns to his hometown in Ireland in 1932 following a 10-year exile in America. He decides to reopen a community hall with the help of the locals, but faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Cymbeline
programme.desc: In this innovative, modern adaptation that reimagines Shakespeare's drama as a conflict between dirty cops and ruthless bikers, a schemer bets that he can seduce a friend's wife, whose father is a fearsome criminal(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake is left to raise his daughter, Katie, on his own after his wife dies in a car accident and he suffers a mental breakdown. He struggles with daily routines and his relatives intend to take Katie away, but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: A married couple find their love affair with alcohol threatening to unravel their relationship when the time comes to confront their addiction head on. Charlie (Aaron Paul) and Kate (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) are a fun-loving couple, but their heavy drinking is starting to become a problem. As Kate constructs a series of elaborate lies to conceal her addiction from her co-workers, her relationship with her mother begins to deteriorate. Realizing that she needs to get sober in order to pull out of her downward spiral, she finds that Charlie is reluctant to join her, and starts to see their relationship in a new light. Meanwhile, once she gathers the courage to set the bottle aside, the real fight begins. Octavia L. Spencer, Nick Offerman, and Megan Mullally co-star(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: William Shakespeare's 'Romeo & Juliet'
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Claire Danes star in Baz Luhrmann's Oscar-nominated, BAFTA-winning version of Shakespeare's tale of 'star cross'd' lovers. Updated in setting to Verona Beach, where the gangs of the corporate dynasties, the Capulets and Montagues, battle with guns as much as knives, Luhrmann retains the dialogue but imposes his own stunning visual stamp on the film, making a classic play into a classic film(n)

programme.title: The Lady in the Van
programme.desc: A homeless woman parks her van in the driveway of playwright Alan Bennett's house and lives there for 15 years. Over the course of her stay, the two form a unique friendship(n)

programme.title: Ali G Indahouse
programme.desc: Gross-out gags abound in the big-screen debut of British comic Sacha Baron Cohen's alter ego, Ali G, a white wannabe-rapper who tries to stop a plot to overthrow the British Prime Minister(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Ice Cube co-wrote and stars in this second sequel to the 1995 comedy "Friday," which once again follows a day in the life of two cousins in Los Angeles. This time, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) are robbed by Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and the not-so-jolly old elf has made off with their rent money. John Witherspoon, Bebe Drake(n)

programme.title: EDtv
programme.desc: In this clever satire of voyeurism and celebrity, a San Francisco video-store clerk becomes an overnight star when he agrees to let his life be filmed around-the clock for a reality show. However, the media exposure takes a toll on his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: The baby son of the mega-rich Bennington family, evades three incompetent kidnappers on an adventure across Manhattan. Family(n)

programme.title: Henry Poole Is Here
programme.desc: Henry Poole moves in to a house in his old neighbourhood, to spend what he believes are his remaining days alone. The discovery of a miracle by a nosy neighbour ruptures his solitude and restores his faith in life(n)

programme.title: First Sunday
programme.desc: Two bumbling criminals try to rob a church, but haven't reckoned on the angry parishioners(n)

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: A has-been screenwriter reluctantly takes a teaching job at a university in New York. He soon becomes emotionally invested in the lives of his students, particularly a single mother who recently caught the writing bug(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Anthony Hopkins and Chris Rock. A man takes his dead twin brother's place as a CIA operative in order to trap a gang of nuclear arms terrorists. But the ruthless criminals learn of the deception and kidnap his fiancee(n)

programme.title: Bucky Larson: Born to Be a Star
programme.desc: In this outrageous comedy, grocery worker Bucky Larson discovers his parents were once porn stars, and he travels to California in order to make his own name in the world of adult film(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union, Morris Chestnut, Queen Latifah, and Terrence Howard star in a film concerning a young girl who implores a department-store Santa to find a new husband for her divorced mother for Christmas. Single mother of three Nancy (Union) has been putting the needs of her three children ahead of her own for as far back as she can remember, and lately her youngest daughter, Emily (Khail Bryant), has become acutely aware of her mother's palpable sadness. As Christmas draws near, Nancy takes her kids to the mall for a cheerful visit with jolly old Saint Nick. When it comes time for Emily's turn to sit on Santa's lap and make her Christmas wish, she selflessly remembers her mother's recent comment that a compliment from a man would be the best gift of all. Determined to make her mother happy again even if it means sacrificing her own wish, Emily relays the message to Santa (Chestnut), not realizing that the man beneath the beard is actually an office-supply salesman and ambitious singer/songwriter named Benjamin. Recognizing the daughter's love for her mother and sensing something truly special in Nancy, Benjamin cheerfully obliges the young girl, setting into motion a series of events that promise to make this the most memorable holiday in quite some time. Lance Rivera directs a film produced by Shakim Compere and Latifah through Flavor Unit Entertainment(n)

programme.title: First Sunday
programme.desc: Two bumbling criminals try to rob a church, but haven't reckoned on the angry parishioners(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Anthony Hopkins and Chris Rock. A man takes his dead twin brother's place as a CIA operative in order to trap a gang of nuclear arms terrorists. But the ruthless criminals learn of the deception and kidnap his fiancee(n)

programme.title: Ali G Indahouse
programme.desc: Gross-out gags abound in the big-screen debut of British comic Sacha Baron Cohen's alter ego, Ali G, a white wannabe-rapper who tries to stop a plot to overthrow the British Prime Minister(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: Beer for My Horses
programme.desc: Country music star Toby Keith writes and stars in this road movie comedy as a deputy who takes to the road with a fellow cop (played by co-writer Rodney Carrington) in order to save their kidnapped girlfriends. The CMT Films production is directed by Michael Salomon (A Glimpse of Hell), with Ted Nugent, Willie Nelson, Claire Forlani, Barry Corbin, and Tom Skerritt filling out the supporting cast(n)

programme.title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
programme.desc: John Cameron Mitchell co-wrote, directed and stars in this adaptation of his off-Broadway play about the trials and tribulations of an embittered transsexual rock singer touring the country(n)

programme.title: Transmitter Test
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Cherish
programme.desc: Zoe is almost 30 years and longs for love. She listens to the romantic radio station Cherish and dream about meeting the right one. After too many Martinis at the local pub, she gets involved in an absurd kidnapping resulting in the death of a policeman. Zoe is wrongly accused for the death. Zoe is forced into house arrest with electronic tagging, but keep up hope that her life will end up back on track(n)

programme.title: Driving Lessons
programme.desc: Two strong-willed women wield their influence on a shy teenaged boy in this coming-of-age comedy from the United Kingdom. Seventeen-year-old Ben (Rupert Grint) is the son of a soft-spoken vicar (Nicholas Farrell), but it's his mother, Laura (Laura Linney), who rules the household, and she has put Ben cheerfully under her thumb, keeping him busy with a variety of good-will errands for the church and numerous local charity causes. With summer vacation looming before him, Ben is looking forward to learning to drive, but Laura is more interested in spending time with one of the more charming members of the church staff than helping Ben learn how to operate the family automobile. Wanting to earn some pocket money, Ben starts looking for a part-time job and ends up working for Evie Walton (Julie Walters), an elderly and slightly eccentric actress who needs help keeping her garden in shape. Laura believes Evie isn't an especially good influence on her son, though Ben is happy to find someone who encourages his interest in poetry and the larger world (especially girls). One day, Evie announces that she needs to ride to Edinburgh, where she is supposed to give a reading as part of the city's massive music and arts festival. While Ben doesn't have his license, he volunteers to take the wheel, and soon he's confronted with various forms of decadence that his mother has frequently warned him to avoid. Driving Lessons received its North American premiere at the 2006 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens ask the unemployed actors of a canceled science-fiction series to help them win an intergalactic war in this hilarious spoof(n)

programme.title: Someone like You
programme.desc: A talk-show staffer (Ashley Judd) recovers from a broken heart by researching male mating patterns and rooming with her playboy pal (Hugh Jackman) in this tepid romance. Ellen Barkin is a sassy delight as a talk-show host. Greg Kinnear costars. Tony Goldwyn directed(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: In this witty, luminous and bittersweet comedy, the grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Hudson Hawk
programme.desc: A cat burglar is coerced into stealing Da Vinci artifacts that could restore a gold-making machine and destroy the world's monetary system. Meanwhile, he romances a Vatical art restorer and runs from the CIA(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II

programme.title: The Minus Man
programme.desc: Notable as the directorial debut of Blade Runner co-scripter Hampton Fancher, this darkly comic thriller stars affable Owen Wilson as Vann Siegert, a different brand of serial killer: one who actually believes he's doing his deeply depressed victims a service of mercy. Wandering up the West Coast, Vann chooses victims from a parade of colorful social misfits -- including a haggard junkie (singer Sheryl Crow) whose pain he ends with a nip from his flask of poison amaretto -- and expounds on his motives with a pocket tape recorder (a drawling monologue that serves as the film's narrative voice-over). A brief layover in Owensville eventually finds Vann in the company of quarreling middle-aged couple Doug and Jane (Brian Cox and Mercedes Ruehl), who grow fond of the young drifter's amiable demeanor and take him on as a boarder. After landing a job at the local post office, Vann catches the eye of co-worker Ferrin (Janeane Garofalo), and a tentative romance blossoms -- but even love can't distract Vann from his crusade to terminate people's unhappiness: "They come to me like moths, because I shine," he explains. Though not the complex psychological game it purports to be, The Minus Man is an intriguing character study -- imagine a kindler, gentler version of Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer -- with some clever twists and fine performances, including a touching portrayal from the usually acerbic Garofalo. Geared more to the art-movie crowd than to fans of Hitchcockian thrills, this film opened to raves at the 1999 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: A teenager finds himself reaching out to others as he tries to heal his emotional wounds in this drama. Jonathan (Cillian Murphy) is a young man who is having a difficult time coming to terms with the recent death of his father; after falling into a deep depression, he attempts to commit suicide by driving a car off an embankment. Jonathan survives the accident and is sent to a mental institution for treatment. While in the hospital, Jonathan becomes friendly with a disturbed youngster named Toby (Jonathan Jackson), and falls in love with Rachel (Tricia Vessey), another patient at the facility. Also featuring Stephen Rea, On the Edge was the third feature from Irish director John Carney and the first to be backed by a major American studio(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A Kind of Stopwatch. First telecast October 18, 1963, the pedestrian Twilight Zone episode "A Kind of a Stopwatch" was scripted by Rod Serling from a story by Michael D. Rosenthal. Richard Erdman stars as McNulty, a nonstop talker and crashing bore. Unable to engage anyone in conversation, McNulty decides to manufacture a few "pregnant pauses" of his own with the aid of a magic stopwatch, given to him by a batty barfly named Potts (Leon Belasco). Though essentially a comedy, "A Kind of a Stopwatch" boasts an unusually unsettling denouement(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.sub-title: The Last Night of a Jockey
programme.desc: The Last Night of a Jockey. In the tradition of his earlier Alcoa/Goodyear Theater episode "Eddie," Mickey Rooney delivers a tour de force solo performance in the Twilight Zone playlet "The Last Night of a Jockey." Barred from the track for life, crooked jockey Grady (Rooney) boozily expresses the wish to escape his sordid surroundings and become a truly "big man." His wish is granted by his lookalike alter ego (also Rooney), but there's a heavy price to be paid at fadeout time. The first Twilight Zone to be produced by William Froug, "The Last Night of a Jockey" was originally broadcast October 25, 1963(n)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: After the runaway success of Jeepers Creepers in 2001, it was inevitable there would be a sequel, but this is just as smart and scary as the original. The Creeper has just two days of his allotted 23 on earth left to both eat his fill and replenish body parts that have decayed during his enforced years of hibernation. Fortunately, a broken-down bus full of college basketball players and their cheerleaders should provide for his needs. As the students are picked off one by one, their only hope is local farmer Jack Taggart, who's out to avenge his son's death. Victor Salva's film is satisfyingly full of edge-of-the-seat moments, not to mention the required quota of gruesome deaths and gore(n)

Shia LaBeouf plays a teen sentenced to court-ordered home confinement who has a suspicion that his next-door neighbor might be a serial killer. programme.desc: Father Lode. Al (Ed O'Neill) scores a big win at the race track, but he may not be able to enjoy it. programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: He Thought He Could. Season Three of Married. . .With Children begins as a nervous Al Bundy (Ed O'Neill) screws up enough courage to return a library copy of The Little Engine That Could--which he borrowed in 1957. Al is shocked to find the library desk staffed by the same overweight woman (Lu Leonard) who terrorized him in childhood. Evidently little Al left quite an impression with the librarian as well: When he returns to the desk, she remembers him as "the devil boy!" A young Edan Gross is seen as the youthful Al Bundy(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: I'm Goin' to Sweatland. No one believes Peg (Katey Sagal) when she rushes home from the mall claiming to have seen Elvis Presley). But when a sweat-stain in the shape of Elvis' face shows up on a shirt belong to Al (Ed O'Neill), the Bundy household is besieged by faithful acolytes of The King. Trivia note: Boris Sagal, the father of series star Katey Sagal, was the director of the 1965 Presley flick Girl Happy(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: The Camping Show. In this history-making episode, Al (Ed O'Neill), Steve (David Garrison), and Bud (David Faustino) are given ample reason to regret their decision to invite Peg (Katey Sagal), Marcy (Amanda Bearse), and Kelly (Christina Applegate) along on a fishing trip in the woods. The weekend is ruined when all three ladies simultaneously have their periods! Listen for the reference to series star Ed O'Neill's first film Deliverance. Intended as the third-season opener, "A Period Piece" became a nationwide cause celebre when its subject matter ran afoul of the Fox network censors. Ultimately, however, the episode was telecast more and less intact, though its title was changed to "The Camping Show" (a pointless gesture, in that the series' episode titles were never shown onscreen) and it was aired one hour later than its usual 8:30 p.m. time slot(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: A Dump of My Own. Al (Ed O'Neill) puts aside his patriarchal responsibilities--such as they are--to fulfill his lifelong dream, previously elucidated in the Season One episode "Whose Room Is It Anyway?". Simply put, Al constructs his own personal "executive washroom" in the Bundy garage, complete with a magnificent Ferguson toilet--an appliance beautiful enough to kiss, which Al does! This episode was originally titled "The Impossible Dream", a tipoff to its ironic coda(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Her Cups Runneth Over. This is the notorious episode which incurred the wrath of housewife-activist Terry Rakolta, who promptly mounted a campaign to get Married. . .With Children banned from the air. The plot involves a journey to "Francine's of Hollywood", a lingerie store in exotic Oconomowoc, Wisconsin. Surrounded by such well-endowed fellow customers as former Playboy centerfolds Devin Devbasquez and Lynne Austin, Al endeavors to purchase a designer bra as birthday surprise for wife Peg (Katey Sagal. Ironically--if not surprisingly--Ms. Rakolta's crusade against Married. . .With Children served primarily to increase the series' viewership by a huge percentage!(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Draw Back Your Bow. Oliver tries to stop Arrow-obsessed serial killer Carrie Cutter, who is convinced Arrow is her one true love and will stop at nothing to get his attention. Unfortunately, her way of getting noticed is to kill people. Meanwhile, Ray asks Felicity to be his date for a work dinner with some important clients; and Thea auditions new DJs for Verdant and meets a brash DJ with whom she immediately clashes(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Forget Me...Not. Wyatt, the son of "Charmed One" Piper (Holly Marie Combs) and Whitelighter Leo (Brian Krause), is kidnapped by the Cleaners, emissaries of a neutral power force that "cleans up" the mess caused when mortals are accidentally exposed to magic. In their efforts to erase Wyatt's existence, the Cleaners also wipe out the short-term memories of Piper and her sisters, Phoebe (Alyssa Milano) and Paige (Rose McGowan). Elsewhere, Phoebe continues to have problems with her new empath powers; Paige doesn't know what she's unleashing when she uses magic as a defense mechanism against sexual harassment at the workplace; and Leo sends novice Whitelighter Chris (Drew Fuller) on an intriguing new assignment(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Power of Three Blondes. Three blonde wicked witches cast a spell to steal the Halliwell sisters' identities, then the evil doppelgangers set out to rob the Charmed Ones of their individual powers. Elsewhere, Paige is stalked by a pair of gremlins that no mortals can see or hear(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Love's a Witch. Paige gets a new job and meets an attractive man, Richard Montana, but discovers that he is involved in a dangerous feud between two magical families. When she tries to end the rivalry, the spirit of Richard's dead fiancée takes over her body. Chris travels to the underworld in search of a magic potion, but Leo becomes suspicious of his motives(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Family Remains. Sam and Dean investigate sightings of a female ghost in an abandoned house. But their efforts are complicated when a family moves in and the son is kidnapped(n)

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sex & Violence. A seductive siren compels three men to murder their wives in a small Iowa town. Sam and Dean investigate and fall under her spell, leading them to engage in a battle against one another(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Geek in the Guck. The investigation of the murder of a video-game designer reveals the wealth he accumulated during his career, which makes a suspect out of everyone who was in his inner circle. Meanwhile, "squintern" Jessica sheds light on an educational opportunity; and Brennan and Booth discuss Christine's future(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Corpse at the Convention. Brennan gives a keynote speech at a convention for forensic scientists, who are all eager to help when the remains of a body are discovered in a stairwell, but the Jeffersonian team are stunned when Hodgins becomes a murder suspect. Meanwhile, Brennan has an encounter with a rival; and Wendell returns to work with an update on his health(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When a former member of the U.S. Army Special Forces returns to his small hometown in rural Washington State hoping to realise a childhood dream of working in the local lumber mill, he discovers that much has changed. The normally tranquil town is now besieged by drugs, outbreaks of violence and a general feeling of malaise and terror, with many pointing a finger at the influence of a crooked casino where his ex-girlfriend now works as a dancer(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: The film that inspired British comedy hit Hot Fuzz! It's a high-octane thriller with two wise-cracking cops, Martin Lawrence and Will Smith, tracking down drug dealers(n)

programme.desc: We Don't Hurt People. Fallout from a heist impacts the Codys when they discover not all went as planned. Smurf enlists the guys to tie up loose ends, but a deepening rivalry threatens the job. Meanwhile, Pope grows increasingly volatile(n)

programme.desc: Stay Close, Stick Together. Craig recovers from a wound as Baz and Craig sharpen focus on old associates in Mexico. Meanwhile, Pope needs cash and draws Deran and J into a job without Smurf's knowledge, and Deran sends a terrifying message to J(n)

programme.desc: Dead to Me. Pope's birthday approaches as Smurf probes whether the boys are playing by her rules. Meanwhile, J makes discoveries about his mother's estrangement from the family(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Bitter Fruit. The sixth-season opener of Law & Order finds detective Lennie Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) teamed with a new partner, Rey Curtis (Benjamin Bratt). For their first assignment together, Briscoe and Curtis try to piece together the last hours in the life of a murdered girl, using an ATM machine film to determine what happened to the victim between her classroom and her music lesson. The results of the investigation lead to a revenge killing -- which many observers regard as "justice."(n)

Meanwhile, Leo demands that the Elders strip Chris of his whitelighter status(n)

programme.desc: The 200th in the 10th.
